Michigan's early rate of inoculating the population with COVID-19 vaccines — already lagging most other states — is underreporting how many doses of the vaccine are sitting on shelves in hospitals, pharmacies and government health departments.

The Michigan…

articles.author: Matt Houston
articles.title: Employers no longer required to give employees paid sick leave for COVID-19 - WLOX
articles.description: Many U.S. workers will now have to use vacation days to get paid if they are exposed to COVID-19 and cannot work.
articles.content:
BATON ROUGE, La. (WAFB) - Millions of American workers will now have to use vacation days to get paid if they are exposed to COVID-19 and cannot work during quarantine.

articles.author: Greg Iacurci
articles.title: Scammers have taken $36 billion in fraudulent unemployment payments from American workers - CNBC
articles.description: The U.S. has lost at least $36 billion to unemployment fraud since the spring. The new Covid relief law clamps down, but may harm workers in the process.
articles.content:
PUA fraud
Most of the theft has focused on Pandemic Unemployment Assistance, a temporary program created by the federal CARES Act in March. It offers unemployment benefits to workers who don't ordin… [+4694 chars]
